He left Earth on a cloudy day. He knew he shouldn't have done so, but
the situation was more than dire. Besides, his ancestry had made him
reckless enough to do so.

A report from Cybertron had come to the refugees on Earth. The dark
one had escaped the enemy's hands. With the help of the humans, he set
out immediately.

His mission was simple, but it was also going to be a hard one.

He set his small sleek ship on autopilot and let his spark guide him...
